      • readDir

        public static ArrayList<Certification> readDir()
                                        throws IOException,
                                               org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Read all files in a specific json format and build a list of Certification instances representing information about certification courses.
        Returns:
        An array of Certificition with the information in json files in the directory.
        Throws:
        IOException - reading some file or diretory.
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - the file json is not in the expected format.

      • readFile

        public static Certification readFile(String fileName)
                              throws IOException,
                                     org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Create a Certification instance from a json file. Please, see in resources to know more about the format of the file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the json file with the information of the certification.
        Returns:
        a Certification instance
        Throws:
        IOException - reading the file
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - json format error.

      • obtainProfiles

        public static ArrayList<String> obtainProfiles(String text)
        Given a text, return a list of their parts. The char for separation is "-".
        Parameters:
        text - A agregate by "-".
        Returns:
        A list of their parts.

      • obtainSummary

        public static String obtainSummary(String[] sFields,
                                   org.json.simple.JSONObject jo)
        Given a Json object return a string showing all their parts.
        Parameters:
        sFields - The name of the idenfitiers to retrieve the fields to be concatenated.
        jo - an JsonObject with the entries idetified by sFields.
        Returns:
        An string resulting of concatenated all the fields identified by sFields.
